topics.body:
Well I just read the dumbest fucking thing today:
For those of you that don't know IP blocking on the English Southeast Asia servers for Phantasy Star Online 2 has been removed, meaning that if you don't know any asian languages you can just play the english version now; the dumb thing going around is that casuals are upset cause the game is play to win not pay to win.

Is it just me or do we live in a weird fucking world where playing to win a game, instead of paying to win, is considered "unfair"?

Tl:dr; casuals, "You mean I have to play to win the game and that I can't just drop $100 to win it?!  Worst game ever!"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
